trends: There have been no other sightings in Green Sea
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsOn my iPad so will make it short, I hate this keypad thingy. Same as before multi colored lights flashing pulsating . Got some pictures and video but to far off to be great. Been hoping it would come back and had camera ready just to far away to see good but thru binoculars you could not see the shape just all different colors flashing. I will download the pics and video and if you send me a email I will reply and hopefully be able send them. 3rd time seeing this craft always to the south this tine in the west . Lasted about an hour this time before moving off to the south west
Summary: 3rd time we have seen this craft blinks all different colors very bright last 2 times was directly south of the house and. Hovered for hours before leaving
